verses.text:
What will ye do with-out Him? light-en your fear, and
He will stand and shield you, a pres-ent help al-way; What will ye do with-out Him?

He will not leave nor for-sake you, when cares and sor-rows fall,
And when you meet, when think of care, The sure one you will call.

He was your heav-enly Guard, O! our trust be in the
word of care and toil, to share's the voice of prayer;

chorus.text: Our sure-est stay, our sure-est stay, He sure-est stay, our sure-est stay!
